message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $22,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $22,000 is significantly higher than you're willing to go.  To be fair, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This is a serious offer, reflecting the true value of this product.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $15,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, you're getting closer. $15,000 is a good price, but to seal the deal today, I'm proposing a final offer of $16,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable product at a reasonable price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $15,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
